execution_plan.description: Find orders in the EU sales database whose customer_id does not exist in the EU customers table.
execution_plan.query: SELECT 'EU' AS region, o.id AS order_id, o.customer_id, o.total_eur, o.updated_at, o.coupon_code FROM orders o LEFT JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.id WHERE c.id IS NULL;

execution_plan.description: Find orders in the US sales database whose customer_id does not exist in the US customers table.
execution_plan.query: SELECT 'US' AS region, o.id AS order_id, o.customer_id, o.total_eur, o.updated_at, o.coupon_code FROM orders o LEFT JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.id WHERE c.id IS NULL;
